Class Enemy

    • yahtzee.Enemy

  • public class Enemy
extends java.lang.Object
    An enemy object which can play the game and also can decide for keeping dice and taking down combinations
    Author:
    Marek Zidek

      • play

      • EvaluateBest

        public void EvaluateBest()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Actual decision three. It's divided into two sections for the part, when a player hasn't used all his available rolls and can decide which dice to keep, and a part when the player decides what combination to take down. It starts with the best and obvious choices and goes down to low combinations eg. the last choice is it keeps whatever is not taken down yet. Every part of decision is commented in code.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
